tidbits.title: Principality on the French Riviera
tidbits.description: Monaco is a tiny sovereign city-state on the French Riviera, known for its luxury, casinos, and as a playground for the rich and famous.

tidbits.title: Glamour and Prestige
tidbits.description: The principality exudes glamour, with prestigious events like the Formula 1 Grand Prix and luxurious yachts lining its harbor.

tidbits.title: Cultural Charm
tidbits.description: Despite its small size, Monaco has cultural charm, with museums, gardens, and historic sites like the Prince's Palace.
